remarks: The unit vector is zero at its designated coordinate.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
uvcvv.u $e |- U = ( R unitVec I ) $.
uvcvv.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
uvcvv.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
uvcvv.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. I ) $.
uvcvv0.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. I ) $.
uvcvv0.jk $e |- ( ph -> J =/= K ) $.
uvcvv0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
uvcvv0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( U ` J ) ` K ) = .0. ) $.
